HarmonyHIPVotingPlugin.note: To be deployed - HIP voting plugin implementation

HarmonyHIPVotingSetup.note: To be deployed - HIP voting setup contract

HarmonyHIPVotingPluginRepo.note: To be deployed - HIP voting plugin repository

HarmonyDelegationVotingPlugin.note: To be deployed - Delegation voting plugin implementation with validatorAddress storage

HarmonyDelegationVotingSetup.note: To be deployed - Delegation voting setup contract (requires validatorAddress param)

HarmonyDelegationVotingPluginRepo.note: To be deployed - Delegation voting plugin repository

HIPPluginAllowlist.note: To be deployed - Allowlist contract for HIP plugin access control

HIPPluginAllowlistProxy.note: To be deployed - UUPS Proxy for HIP allowlist

HarmonyValidatorOptInRegistry.note: To be deployed - Validator opt-in registry for voting delegation

features.HarmonyDelegationVoting: Requires validatorAddress in installation params, supports UPDATE_VALIDATOR_PERMISSION
features.HarmonyHIPVoting: Restricted by HIPPluginAllowlist, only authorized DAOs can install
features.HIPPluginAllowlist: Controlled by Management DAO, manages which DAOs can use HIP plugin
